last_episode_to_air.name: Outside
last_episode_to_air.overview: Juliette's fate seems sealed when certain truths finally come to light.

name: Silo
overview: In a ruined and toxic future, a community exists in a giant underground silo that plunges hundreds of stories deep. There, men and women live in a society full of regulations they believe are meant to protect them.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: Stranded outside her silo with a failing suit, Juliette Nichols races against time, stunned to find another silo nearby that could be her only hope for survival. Meanwhile, unrest brews inside her original silo as Bernard Holland rallies citizens to maintain order amid rising questions about their world. As Juliette faces unexpected dangers near the new silo, hidden truths about the silos’ origins and the world beyond begin to surface, deepening the mystery.

episodes.name: Freedom Day
episodes.overview: Sheriff Becker's plans for the future are thrown off course after his wife meets a hacker with information about the silo.

episodes.name: Holston's Pick
episodes.overview: Juliette, an engineer, pieces together what might have led to a co-worker's mysterious death.

episodes.name: Machines
episodes.overview: In her hunt for a new sheriff, Mayor Jahns clashes with Bernard. Juliette strikes a deal to keep the generator running.

episodes.name: Truth
episodes.overview: Juliette tries gaining the trust of Deputy Marnes as they work to uncover the truth about recent tragedies.

episodes.name: The Janitor's Boy
episodes.overview: Sims appoints Billings as chief deputy to keep tabs on Juliette, whose efforts to solve two murders lead to a showdown.

episodes.name: The Relic
episodes.overview: During her investigation, Juliette uncovers disturbing secrets about someone she thought she knew.

episodes.name: The Flamekeepers
episodes.overview: Bernard seeks Juliette's cooperation as he grows increasingly concerned about the silo's security. Juliette asks her father for a favor.

episodes.name: Hanna
episodes.overview: New information causes Juliette to see her family's past differently—and she finally gains access to the silo's biggest secrets.

episodes.name: The Getaway
episodes.overview: Racked with guilt, Billings sets off on a personal mission, only to discover a mind-blowing clue from Juliette.

episodes.name: Outside
episodes.overview: Juliette's fate seems sealed when certain truths finally come to light.
